file_content.text: [The Empire has deactivated this comm station.]
Jarrde. The sensor array is down. The backup generator's dead.
Not bad, Republic. But there's still more to do. Our scouts checked out the rest of the factory's defenses.
There's some heavy anti-aircraft equipment in place. Artillery, radar, a couple shields--all automated.
Plan was to send up modified speeders for a bombardment. Can't happen if these defenses stay up.
Gutsy move.
Took months to plan. And it'll all be for nothing if we can't clear their way.
Won't a bombardment destroy the factory?
Could be overkill.
Lot of our men used to work there. We know what spots to avoid.
I have to do everything.
You want to fight, save it for the Empire. We're on the same side here.
The anti-aircraft defenses are operated by control stations throughout the factory. I've got the coordinates.
Destroy them and our speeders are in the clear. Just be careful--some pretty big squads guarding these.
Understood.
Just how I like it.
The way you charged right into that sensor array, I'd believe it.
Better be worth it.
Sure. You get this done, Republic, and I might even shake your hand.
Destroy those control stations and get back here fast as you can. We'll be waiting.
[This comm station cannot be activated at this time.]
Not bad, Republic. The sensor array's down and our scouts have infiltrated the factory. But there's still work to be done.
There's some heavy anti-aircraft equipment in place. Artillery, radar, a couple shields--all operated by a crack shot Imperial gunnery squad.
Plan was to send up modified speeders for a bombardment. Can't happen with those gunners threatening the skies.
The Imperial gunners are manning the anti-aircraft turrets at control stations throughout the factory.
Take them out and our speeders are clear. Just be careful--those gunners are as deadly with a blaster as they are a turret.
Wipe out that gunnery squad and get back here fast as you can. We'll be waiting.
